title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Research Scientist II Posts
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has declared the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Project Research Scientist II Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their MBBS, Post Graduation, MD/ MS, DNB can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2026 . Interested candidates can attend...
